document_data.mainbody:
Admirals Way was a dockside street in the Lower City of Baldurs Gate.
Admirals Way was located in the Eastway, a single city block south of Sailors Crossing plaza. The Low Lantern festhall was docked at the eastern end of Admirals Way in the 15 century DR.
In the summer of the , on Kythorn 19, the Sailors Crossing plaza became a scene of a grizzly murder, located just within earshot of Admirals Way. A puking human male was reported being on Admirals Way shortly after the murder took place, but the detective missed the opportunity to interrogate the likely witness.
